title: FS: 1888 S.F. Hess California League, Noonan Sold, thanks
author: edjs

posts.post_title: FS: 1888 S.F. Hess California League, Noonan Sold, thanks
posts.post_content:
Hi all, I am looking to sell my 1888 S.F. Hess California League Noonan.  Price is $1250.  I am accepting PayPal.  Price is net to me, so please add 3% for regular PayPal.  Domestic shipping is on me.  Shipping to other countries, I will work with you on price.

Additional scans available on request.  Thanks, and feel free to e-mail any questions: [URL="skeltone@rocketmail.com"]skeltone@rocketmail.com[/URL].

  
First commitment to buy will go before ongoing negotiations.
